And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah, and Jehu the Antothite,
And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
And the sons of Issachar; Tola, and Phuvah, and Job, and Shimron.
The children of Shephatiah, the children of Hattil, the children of Pochereth of Zebaim, the children of Ami.
And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
Then upon Jahaziel the son of Zechariah, the son of Benaiah, the son of Jeiel, the son of Mattaniah, a Levite of the sons of Asaph, came the Spirit of the Lord in the midst of the congregation;
And the sons of Benjamin were Belah, and Becher, and Ashbel, Gera, and Naaman, Ehi, and Rosh, Muppim, and Huppim, and Ard.

Then certain of the heads of the children of Ephraim, Azariah the son of Johanan, Berechiah the son of Meshillemoth, and Jehizkiah the son of Shallum, and Amasa the son of Hadlai, stood up against them that came from the war,
And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
Hilkiah the second, Tebaliah the third, Zechariah the fourth: all the sons and brethren of Hosah were thirteen.
And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
And the sons of Kohath by their families; Amram, and Izehar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
Judah, and Benjamin, and Shemaiah, and Jeremiah,
The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
Now among these were of the children of Judah, Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah:

Asaph the chief, and next to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obed-edom: and Jeiel with psalteries and with harps; but Asaph made a sound with cymbals;
The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.

Then they came to Gedaliah to Mizpah, even Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and Johanan and Jonathan the sons of Kareah, and Seraiah the son of Tanhumeth, and the sons of Ephai the Netophathite, and Jezaniah the son of a Maachathite, they and their men.
And his brethren, chief of the fathers, two hundred forty and two: and Amashai the son of Azareel, the son of Ahasai, the son of Meshillemoth, the son of Immer,
And the sons of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, and Gatam, and Kenaz.
Also of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hashub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Bunni;
And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.

These are the sons of Ephraim after their families: of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthalhites: of Becher, the family of the Bachrites: of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.
And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.
And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.
Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
The sons of Joel; Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,
And the sons of Ezra were, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she bare Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.

Then certain of the heads of the children of Ephraim, Azariah the son of Johanan, Berechiah the son of Meshillemoth, and Jehizkiah the son of Shallum, and Amasa the son of Hadlai, stood up against them that came from the war,
And the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, Jekameam the fourth.
And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.
Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
And the sons of Shemida were, Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.
And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.
And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
And these are they that conspired against him; Zabad the son of Shimeath an Ammonitess, and Jehozabad the son of Shimrith a Moabitess.
And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.

And to the sons of Gershom throughout their families out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
And the rest of the sons of Levi were these: Of the sons of Amram; Shubael: of the sons of Shubael; Jehdeiah.
The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. The sons of Mahli; Eleazar, and Kish.
The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
And the sons of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, and Gatam, and Kenaz.
And the sons of Reuben; Hanoch, and Phallu, and Hezron, and Carmi.
And of the sons of Shephatiah; Zebadiah the son of Michael, and with him fourscore males.
The son of Shallum, the son of Zadok, the son of Ahitub,
Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
And his brethren, chief of the fathers, two hundred forty and two: and Amashai the son of Azareel, the son of Ahasai, the son of Meshillemoth, the son of Immer,
Of the sons of Pahath-moab; Elihoenai the son of Zerahiah, and with him two hundred males.
And of the sons of Elam; Jeshaiah the son of Athaliah, and with him seventy males.
The sons of Shimei; Shelomith, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These were the chief of the fathers of Laadan.
And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.

And with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, the porters.
And of the tribe of the children of Simeon, Shemuel the son of Ammihud.
And Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;

verses.text: Of the sons of Bani; Maadai, Amram, and Uel,

similars.text: And of the sons of Bani; Meshullam, Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.
And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.
And the sons of Ulla; Arah, and Haniel, and Rezia.
The son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,
And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the children of Pharez the son of Judah.

verses.text: Benaiah, Bedeiah, Chelluh,
Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,

similars.text: Shechaniah, Rehum, Meremoth,
Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,

verses.text: Mattaniah, Mattenai, and Jaasau,

similars.text: And of Joiarib, Mattenai; of Jedaiah, Uzzi;

verses.text: And Bani, and Binnui, Shimei,
And Shelemiah, and Nathan, and Adaiah,

similars.text: Judah, and Benjamin, and Shemaiah, and Jeremiah,
And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
And Azariah, Ezra, and Meshullam,
Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
Judah, and Benjamin, and Shemaiah, and Jeremiah,
And their brethren, Shebaniah, Hodijah, Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,

verses.text: Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Azareel, and Shelemiah, Shemariah,

similars.text: Benjamin, Malluch, and Shemariah.
Shemaiah, and Joiarib, Jedaiah,
Zaccur, Sherebiah, Shebaniah,

verses.text: Shallum, Amariah, and Joseph.

similars.text: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.

verses.text: Of the sons of Nebo; Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jadau, and Joel, Benaiah.

similars.text: Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
And of the sons of Pahath-moab; Adna, and Chelal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezaleel, and Binnui, and Manasseh.
And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.
And of the sons of Zattu; Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, and Jeremoth, and Zabad, and Aziza.
And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
Of the sons also of Bebai; Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, and Athlai.
And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
And of the sons of Elizaphan; Shimri, and Jeiel: and of the sons of Asaph; Zechariah, and Mattaniah:
Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
The son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.
The sons of Benjamin; Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.
The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
Moreover of Israel: of the sons of Parosh; Ramiah, and Jeziah, and Malchiah, and Miamin, and Eleazar, and Malchijah, and Benaiah.
And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.
And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.
And of the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hasenuah,
Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
And these are the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Joed, the son of Pedaiah, the son of Kolaiah, the son of Maaseiah, the son of Ithiel, the son of Jesaiah.
The sons of Jehieli; Zetham, and Joel his brother, which were over the treasures of the house of the Lord.
And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
And Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, who dwelt in Aroer, even unto Nebo and Baal-meon:
And of the sons of Heman; Jehiel, and Shimei: and of the sons of Jeduthun; Shemaiah, and Uzziel.
And of the sons of Bani; Meshullam, Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.
And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah the first, and Jesiah the second.
And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
Of the children of Ephraim, Hoshea the son of Azaziah: of the half tribe of Manasseh, Joel the son of Pedaiah:
The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.
The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
And the sons of Uzzi; Izrahiah: and the sons of Izrahiah; Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, five: all of them chief men.
And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
Moreover the sons of Obed-edom were, Shemaiah the firstborn, Jehozabad the second, Joah the third, and Sacar the fourth, and Nethaneel the fifth,
The sons of Joel; Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,
And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,

And with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, the porters.
And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
And the sons of Meshelemiah were, Zechariah the firstborn, Jediael the second, Zebadiah the third, Jathniel the fourth,
And the sons of Benjamin were Belah, and Becher, and Ashbel, Gera, and Naaman, Ehi, and Rosh, Muppim, and Huppim, and Ard.
The sons of Laadan; the chief was Jehiel, and Zetham, and Joel, three.
And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.

verses.text: All these had taken strange wives: and some of them had wives by whom they had children.

similars.text: And they took their daughters to be their wives, and gave their daughters to their sons, and served their gods.
